metadata.title: CVE-2024-2615 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 123. Some of these bugs showedevidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort someof these could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 124.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs102 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
